text: Satya Deo Singh is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha from Balrampur in the 1991 and 1996 Indian general election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was President of Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha from 1980 to 1985.Ex BJP MP Satyadev Singh summoned in murder caseEx-BJP MP Satyadev Singh summoned in murder caseMy Neta ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:People from Gonda, Uttar Pradesh Category:10th Lok Sabha members Category:11th Lok Sabha members Category:Bharatiya Jana Sangh politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Satya Deo Singh
